# Font.Leading.standard

**Case**

The font’s default line spacing.

## Declaration

```swift
case standard
```

## Discussion

If you modify a font to use a nonstandard line spacing like [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/Font/Leading/tight] or [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/Font/Leading/loose], you can use this value to return to the font’s default line spacing.

## Getting leading line spacing options

- **Font.Leading.loose**: Increased line spacing.
- **Font.Leading.tight**: Reduced line spacing.
title: Font.Leading.standard
